screenshots.caption: Screenshot from the example program. It is a spinning 3d cube.

name: HasseGameLib
short_description: HasseGameLib is (currently) a one-man project of making a library for making programming CLI-Games a little bit easier. It has some functions for drawing to the CLI, making savefiles and reading them and it also has a keylistener. It is currently linux-only, I'm planning on making a windows version.
summary: A library to ease the making of CLI-games
